entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some lifecycle events under macOS are not working #11423
  • Unable to load font 'monospace' #11422
  • [Enhancement] Add support for ExpandoObject Binding to a ListView.ItemSource #11419
  • Radio button loses initial 'IsChecked=True' value when another radio button also has 'IsChecked=True' #11418
    Backlog
  • Maui.Graphics.Platform.PlatformGraphicsView Token Type Not Resolved #11413
  • Random crashes when using Drag&Drop with images #11411
    Backlog
  • [iOS]No Keyboard popup on Entry and Editor focus #11406
    Backlog
  • Remove calls to Console.WriteLine to decrease app size #11405
    Backlog
  • Line coordinates not computed correctly #11404
    Backlog
  • TabbedPage App on resize hides page bottom content #11402
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from ShellToolbar OnBackButtonCanExecuteChanged #11401
  • Low quality of the icon in the sample project #11400
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI : Error CS0012- The type 'object' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=84e04ff9cfb79065'. #11399
  • Inputs on WPF Blazor Web View Control Not showing right click #11398

Closed

  • Symbol packages are not generated #11408
    Backlog
  • Selected item color 'CollectionView' in .NET 7. #11393
  • Editor in .Net MAUI does not take full width when inside a stack/grid layout #8232
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] Editor typing is inconsistent #7627
  • The text enters in reverse when "TextTransform = TextTransform.Uppercase" in Entry and Editor #11416
    Backlog
  • Spaces in static files (CSS, JS, images, etc.) not working in MAUI Blazor for Windows #9181
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Maui Blazor input display language problem #9928
    .NET 8 Planning
  • UIDeviceFamily 6 breaks Mac Catalyst UI #11377
    Backlog
  • Circular progress animation of RefreshView keeps spinning even after all data has been successfully loaded #11388
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio is not able to pair to Mac after Ventura upgrade #10979

PullRequests

Created

  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11417
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11415
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix crash using complex html content #11409
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label

Merged

  • Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #10876
    area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 3.2.9 to 4.0.0 #11407
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools #11396

Updated

  • Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11175
    area/layout 🔲, layout-scrollview
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Don't set editor action to handled #11386
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Update Essentials AppInfo API Docs #11374
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11370
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11378
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11394
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11395
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11373
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Reboot on-prem agent after job completion #11359
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • CodeQL only on main/non-public builds #11273
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11390
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11389
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
